name: A Bot´s Best Virus
description:
<Play in fullscreen for the intended experience> Controls:

Right-Mouse Button: Direct the Virus, Hold the Virus in place

Left-Mouse Button: Dash 

WASD - Move

Mechanics:

 

The main gimmick of this game is your virus friends, who joins together with you. 

He´ll  constantly try to kill whatever´s nearest to him. You can guide him with the left-mouse button. You may even have him hold still or attack dangerous monsters for you: however, doing

 so will increase his power.!

The more power the enemy has, the faster and easier it´ll be for him to kill a target.

Also, after being held in place a while, the virus will quickly "Lash Out" at whatever´s closest to him: an enemy, or you.

Power-Up Boxes either gives you HP or reduces the enemy´s power, depending on who picked it.

Story:

When a Bot finds his computer to be raided by virus, he chooses the best ally:, the strongest virus to help him. 

However, his ally wants him that. As such, you´ll have to manage attacking with him, which will make him grow stronger, or attacking yourself, which will likely see you taking damage.
